pages.title: Mutant Creeper
pages.text: Naturally spawned $(key)Creepers$() have a small chance to mutate into a $(key)Mutant Creeper$().$(br)They can also be spawned manually via $(mage/spell#summon)Spell Summon$() or a $(key)Splash Potion of Chemical X$().$(br2)Defeating a $(key)Mutant Creeper$() drops a $(key)Creeper Shard$(), which can be used to craft $(mage/spell#break)Remote Destruction$().
